trans-unit.source: You can import and export large amounts of data between files and the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database. Instead of having to use INSERT and SELECT statements, you can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures to import data directly from files into tables and to export data from tables into files.

seg-source.mrk: You can import and export large amounts of data between files and the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

Instead of having to use INSERT and SELECT statements, you can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures to import data directly from files into tables and to export data from tables into files.

target.mrk: You can import and export large amounts of data between files and the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

Instead of having to use INSERT and SELECT statements, you can use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures to import data directly from files into tables and to export data from tables into files.

trans-unit.source: The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures import and export data in delimited data file format.

seg-source.mrk: The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures import and export data in delimited data file format.

target.mrk: The <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> system procedures import and export data in delimited data file format.

trans-unit.source: Use the export system procedures to write data from a database to one or more files that are stored outside of the database. You can use a procedure to export data from a table into a file or export data from a SELECT statement result into a file.

seg-source.mrk: Use the export system procedures to write data from a database to one or more files that are stored outside of the database.
You can use a procedure to export data from a table into a file or export data from a SELECT statement result into a file.

target.mrk: Use the export system procedures to write data from a database to one or more files that are stored outside of the database.
You can use a procedure to export data from a table into a file or export data from a SELECT statement result into a file.

trans-unit.source: Use the import system procedures to import data from a file into a table. If the target table already contains data, you can replace or append to the existing data.

seg-source.mrk: Use the import system procedures to import data from a file into a table.
If the target table already contains data, you can replace or append to the existing data.

target.mrk: Use the import system procedures to import data from a file into a table.
If the target table already contains data, you can replace or append to the existing data.
